trans-unit.source: Represents the custom properties that are common to data points, series and empty points.
This class defines custom properties such as colors, the use of background images, hatching, and so forth.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> class, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint> class and the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.EmptyPointStyle%2A> property are all derived from this class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties"></xref> class.
The series that the data point belongs to.
A flag that indicates whether this is a data point custom property.
Gets or sets the text of the X-axis label for the data point, series or an empty point.
This property is only used if a custom label has not been specified for the relevant <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object.
This property can only be set at run time for a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> object.
If you set this property or a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> object, all of its data points will use this label.

If the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.AxisLabel%2A> property is not set and a custom label has not been specified, an axis label will be generated automatically using the axis scale.
Empty point labels are set using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.EmptyPointStyle%2A> property.
The text of the X-axis label.
Gets or sets the background gradient style.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the background gradient style.
Gets or sets the background hatching style.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the background hatching style.
Gets or sets the background image of the data point.
The background image of the data point.
Gets or sets the alignment of the background image, which is used with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode.Unscaled"></xref> drawing mode.
The alignment of the background image.
Gets or sets a color that will be replaced with a transparent color when the background image is drawn.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that will be replaced with a transparent color when the image is drawn.
Gets or sets the drawing mode of the background image.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"></xref> enumeration value that defines the drawing mode of the background image.
Gets or sets the secondary background color.
The secondary background color.
Gets or sets the border color of the data point.
The border color of the data point.
Gets or sets the border style of the data point.
The border style of the data point.
Gets or sets the border width of the data point.
The border width of the data point.
Gets or sets the color of the data point.
The color of the data point.
Gets or sets the custom properties of the data point.
Custom properties can be specified in the following format: AttrName1=Value1, AttrName2=Value2 â€¦
The custom properties of the data point.
Gets or sets the extended custom properties of the data point.
The extended custom properties of the data point.
Deletes the data point custom property with the specified name.
The name of the property to delete.
Gets or sets the font of the data point.
The font of the data point.
Returns the data point custom property with the specified name.
The name of the property to return.
The data point custom property with the specified name.
If the requested property is not set, the default custom property of the data series will be returned.
Determines whether a custom property with the specified name was set.
The name of the custom property to check.
`true` if the custom property was set; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether to show the value of the data point on the label.
`true` to show the value of the data point on the label; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether the item is shown in the legend.
`true` if the item is shown in the legend; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties"></xref> object by its position in the collection.
The index of the custom property.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties"></xref> object at the specified index.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties"></xref> object by name.
The name of the custom property.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties"></xref> object with the specified name.
Gets or sets the text of the data point label.
The text of the data point label.
Gets or sets the angle of the data point label.
The angle of the data point label.
Gets or sets the background color of the data point label.
The background color of the data point label.
Gets or sets the border color of the data point label.
The border color of the data point label.
Gets or sets the border style of the label.
The border style of the label.
Gets or sets the width of the label border.
The width of the label border.
Gets or sets the text color of the label.
The text color of the label.
Gets or sets the format of the data point label.
The format of the data point label.
Gets or sets the map area attributes of the data point label.
The map area attributes of the data point label.
Gets or sets the postback value which can be processed on a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click"></xref> event.
The postback value that is passed to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click"></xref> event.
Gets or sets the tooltip for the data point label.
The tooltip for the data point label.
Gets or sets the URL target of the data point label.
The URL target of the data point label.
Gets or sets the attributes of the legend map area.
The attributes of the legend map area.
Gets or sets the postback value which can be processed on a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click"></xref> event.
The postback value passed to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click"></xref> event.
Gets or sets the text of the item in the legend.
The text of the item in the legend.
Gets or sets the tooltip of the item in the legend.
The tooltip of the item in the legend.
Gets or sets the URL target of the item in the legend.
The URL target of the item in the legend.
Gets or sets the map area attributes of a data point.
The map area attributes of a data point.
Gets or sets the border color of the marker.
The border color of the marker.
Gets or sets the border width of the marker.
The border width of the marker.
Gets or sets the marker color.
The marker color.
Gets or sets the marker image.
The marker image.
Gets or sets the color that will be replaced with a transparent color when the marker image is drawn.
The color that will be replaced with a transparent color when the marker image is drawn.
Gets or sets the size of the marker.
The size of the marker.
Gets or sets the marker style.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
Gets or sets the postback value that can be processed on a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click"></xref> event.
The postback value passed to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click"></xref> event.
Resets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.IsValueShownAsLabel"></xref> property to its default value.
Resets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.IsVisibleInLegend"></xref> property to its default value.
Sets a custom property of the data point.
The name of the property.
The value of the property.
Sets the default properties of the data point.
Indicates whether the previous property values must be cleared.
If the `clearAll` parameter is set to `true`, all previous property values are cleared, otherwise they are not.
A flag that indicates whether to clear previous property values.
Gets or sets the tooltip of the data point.
The tooltip of the data point.
Gets or sets the URL target of the area.
The URL target of the area.
